name: Ill Omen
description:
controls: arrowkeys+mouse

a few things got left out cuz of jam time limits, abilities, most items, most enemies, sound, story :O

yellow items are unidentified, you can id them at an npc or just equip them to see their stats. however some of them have some negative effect and can't be removed, the id npc can destroy them

dyin reverts you to your last save.  the web version rerolls the maps also, too much data to cram into localstorage

watch this space for updates if you wanna
